definition: to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Mama was the best helper a boy ever had.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽是一個男孩此刻能找到的最好幫手了。

sentences.english: Regular review ca strong make our new knowledge perma strongnent.
sentences.chinese: 按期複習能幫手波動新知識。

sentences.english: The computerized talking dictionary, unparalleled in the world, is. a good assis. ant for your successful career.
sentences.chinese: 真人發聲電腦辭典，獨步天下，事業成功好幫手。

sentences.english: Hot little helper you got here, huh, Santa?
sentences.chinese: 熱心的小幫手，來這裏，聖誕老人？

sentences.english: This two little helpers kept painting out of the circles.
sentences.chinese: 一直畫出界線外的兩位小幫手。

sentences.english: The quick -dry Blueprinter is a good helper for an architect .
sentences.chinese: 能快速乾燥的曬圖機，是建築設計師的好幫手。

sentences.english: The upper minimizing eyelids from the corner of the eye to eye end oblique upper direction sprelisting; helps improve skin.
sentences.chinese: 高低眼瞼從眼角至眼尾斜上方向抹開，幫手提拔肌膚。

sentences.english: For McGrady, it'd be his shot at complete control over a team, with a plethora of sidekicks .
sentences.chinese: 對麥迪來說，他將完全掌控球隊，並有一批好幫手。

sentences.english: If you want more reference material now, Wikipedia is always a good starting point.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想更多的參考材料，維基始終是個好幫手。

sentences.english: John was with them as their helper.
sentences.chinese: 也有約翰作他們的幫手。

sentences.english: English can help us understand⑤ many new books and movies.
sentences.chinese: 英語能幫手我們相識許多書戰影戲。

sentences.english: He told the farmer he wanted to apply for a job as a farmhand.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人告訴農場主他想在農場裏當一個幫手。
你可以自己選擇你需要的幫手。

sentences.english: In short, they are perfect accomplices.
sentences.chinese: 一句話，它們是完美的幫手。

sentences.english: Thank you! Boys and girls. You are good helpers.
sentences.chinese: 以下是我們第四學月的好幫手名單。

definition: to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
to become aware/to detect/to realize/to perceive
at any time/at all times/at the right time
to seize an opportunity/to take advantage of situation
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
